original_text: He saves a person from death, so that he does not go to his grave. He gives light to that person, so that he may enjoy his life. He saves a person from death,
korean_text: 그들의 영혼을 구덩이에서 이끌어 생명의 빛을 그들에게 비추려 하심이니라

sentences.original_text: He saves a person from death
so that he does not go to his grave
He gives light to that person
so that he may enjoy his life
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자신의 생명을 누리게 하시려 함이라
